message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.HC, cs.SY, cs.SE

This paper deals with covert channels and data exfiltration, which are common topics in the computer security (cs.CR) and information theory (cs.IT) sub-categories. The use of acoustic signals and the analysis of the HDD's anatomy and acoustical characteristics suggest that the paper may also fall under the human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and systems and control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Finally, the development of a transmitter and receiver and the evaluation of the proposed method on various types of HDDs suggest that the paper may also belong to the software engineering (cs.SE) sub-category.
